title: South Africa Elegant Adults-Only Franschhoek Retreat with Conservatory Restaurant
description: Discover the scenic Cape Winelands of the Franschhoek Valley at Leeu House. This adults-only retreat is the perfect escape for couples looking to indulge in good food, good wine and good company. Enjoy leisurely meals at The Conservatory or venture over to its sister properties - Leeu Estates and Le Quartier Français - for wine tastings, outstanding restaurants and a serene spa, where treatments are inspired by rich African traditions.

title: South Africa Wine Estate in Franschhoek with Onsite Dining & Wellness Spa
description: With a highly acclaimed culinary and wellness reputation and verdant vineyard setting, Leeu Estates has all the ingredients for a sensational South African adventure. A connoisseur's delight, the estate hosts a world-class wine-tasting studio, the award-winning La Petite Colombe restaurant and the exclusive The Dining Room, where resplendent views of the valley await. Immerse yourself at Leeu Spa by Healing Earth, where treatments are inspired by Africa's natural resources.

title: South Africa France-Inspired Wine Retreat in Franschhoek Village with World-Class Restaurant & Wine Boutique
description: Find French elegance intertwined with South Africa's gourmet winelands at Le Quartier Français, in Franschhoek Valley. Wining and dining is a special affair, with the team behind some of South Africa's best restaurants serving delectable dishes at onsite restaurants, Protégé and Épice, while wine tastings are curated onsite at The Great Heart Wine Boutique. Fill the space between delicious dining with treatments at Leeu Spa at the nearby Leeu Estates.
offer_address: Corner of Berg and Wilhelmina Streets, 7690, Franschhoek, South Africa
